history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Rabs_le_between. hauto use: ln_Rinv, exp_ln, Rinv_0_lt_compat, ln_mult unfold: Rdiv, Rgt, INR, Rminus. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rle_minus_r,Rabs_le_between. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rle_minus_r,Rabs_le_between,Rle_minus_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : 0 < y Unable to unify "ln x - ln y" with "ln (x / y)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y <-> - y <= x <= y" on hypothesis of type "0 < x".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : R, a - c <= b <-> a <= b + c" on hypothesis of type "forall x y : R, - y <= x -> x <= y -> Rabs x <= y".

In environment x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : 0 < y H2 : forall x y : R, - y <= x -> x <= y -> Rabs x <= y H3 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> x <= y H4 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> - y <= x H1 : forall a b c : R, a + c <= b -> a <= b - c H6 : forall a b c : R, a <= b - c -> a + c <= b H5 : forall a b c : R, a <= b + c -> a - c <= b H7 : forall a b c : R, a - c <= b -> a <= b + c Unable to unify "ln x - ln y" with "ln (x / y)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : R, a - c <= b <-> a <= b + c" on hypothesis of type "forall x y : R, - y <= x -> x <= y -> Rabs x <= y".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : R, a <= b - c <-> a + c <= b" on hypothesis of type "forall a b c : R, a + c <= b -> a <= b - c".

In environment x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : 0 < y H2 : forall x y : R, - y <= x -> x <= y -> Rabs x <= y H3 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> x <= y H4 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> - y <= x H1 : forall a b c : R, a + c <= b -> a <= b - c H6 : forall a b c : R, a <= b - c -> a + c <= b H5 : forall a b c : R, a <= b + c -> a - c <= b H7 : forall a b c : R, a - c <= b -> a <= b + c Unable to unify "(Rabs ?M3804 <= ?M3805 -> - ?M3805 <= ?M3804 <= ?M3805) /\\ (- ?M3805 <= ?M3804 <= ?M3805 -> Rabs ?M3804 <= ?M3805)" with "ln (x / y) = ln x - ln y".

In environment x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : 0 < y H2 : forall x y : R, - y <= x -> x <= y -> Rabs x <= y H3 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> x <= y H4 : forall x y : R, Rabs x <= y -> - y <= x H1 : forall a b c : R, a + c <= b -> a <= b - c H6 : forall a b c : R, a <= b - c -> a + c <= b H5 : forall a b c : R, a <= b + c -> a - c <= b H7 : forall a b c : R, a - c <= b -> a <= b + c Unable to unify "ln x - ln y" with "ln (x / y)".

original: intros x y z. split. - intros H. apply Rabs_le_between in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply Rle_minus_r in H1. apply Rle_minus_l in H2. split; auto. - intros [H1 H2]. apply Rle_minus_l in H2. apply Rle_minus_r in H1. apply Rabs_le_between. split; auto.
